title: Worst Summer Ever? Your Job Probably Shouldn't Exist...  9.22.21
itunes:title: Worst Summer Ever? Your Job Probably Shouldn't Exist...  9.22.21
description:
In episode 993, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Bechdel Cast co-host Jamie Loftus to discuss insurance companies don't want to cover COVID victims, why your job is bullshit, Fox not sure how to attack Biden anymore? edible vaccines, Alberta’s World-Leading “Fuck It, The Pandemic’s Over” Experiment Backfired Hard and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Insurers: COVID coverage? Huh? What?
  2. Bullshit Jobs - A Theory That Should Save Us
  3. Fox not sure how to attack Biden anymore? 
  4. EAT YOUR VACCINE
  5. Alberta’s World-Leading “Fuck It, The Pandemic’s Over” Experiment Backfired Hard
  6. LISTEN: Throwing Snow - “Halos”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
